overview: Jacky, a Vietnam-born Chinese man, lives under the flyovers in Sham Shui Po. Despite living on the streets, he still has the aura of an ex-triad leader. However, he has lost his will to live after being tormented by a chronic illness. 露宿深水埗橋底的韋成奇本是越南華僑,當年曾是黑幫大佬,現在雖然餐風宿露,但不減舊日大哥派頭。可是近日深受頑疾纏身,開始意志消沉。(華語紀錄片節 Chinese Documentary Festival 2014, 采風 Visible Record)  Dir. 徐智彥 / Chui Chi Yin  香港 Hong Kong / 2014 / 37 min
title: Jacky
